fields.name: Sedate (Charge 90%):
fields.value: Roleblock your target and decrease their defense power by 0.2x.

fields.name: Extract Teeth (1x, Charge 75%):
fields.value: Grant your target a permanent disability where, if they use any of three random selected letters in their response, they lose half their score (e.g. 80% -> 40%).

fields.name: Patch Up:
fields.value: Your target's defense score will be boosted by (Your Score * 0.4)% tonight.

fields.name: Laughing Gas (Passive):
fields.value: Regardless of what ability you use, you have a [your score]% chance of learning your target's role.
